newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: General Signal sees record 1997 earnings.
newsitem.headline: General Signal sees record 1997 earnings.

text.p: U.S. company General Signal Corp expects to chalk up record sales and profits in fiscal 1997, said chairman and chief executive officer Michael Lockhart on Thursday.
"We expect another record year...sales and profits," in fiscal 1997, Lockhart told reporters at the opening of its office in Singapore.
He said General Signal expected to improve operating margins by almost one percentage point from 12.3 percent in fiscal 1996.
General Signal manufactures products serving the process control, electrical control and industrial technology industries.
For the financial year ended December 31 1996, General Signal reported a net profit of US$133.4 million on record sales of US$2.07 billion.
